PM says assertion NZ citizenship is for sale is "ridiculous." Says two to three hundred cases a year where this kind of discretion is used

English has said the Govt needs to work better with Ratana Church & Maori. Pledges that it will.
PM not resiling from his decision not to go to Waitangi. Making it clear at Ratana he favours the way they handle events

leader @AndrewLittleMP does not accept the view that the move would undermine health and safety laws
Labour to table Pike River legislation when House resumes. Wd exempt Solid Energy from legal liabilities arising from reentry to the mine
Dept also says increased throughput of inmates at MECF may account for fluctuations
Corrections Dept says many incidents caused by single prisoner making repeated self harm attempts ...
Major spike in incidents nationally in 2014-15. 26 cases recorded, up from 4 in 2014-15. 7 were at MECF
Corrections Department figures reveal Mt Eden CF has accounted for 20% of self harm/attempted suicides in NZ prisons over the last five yrs
